Author: marigoldpollen
Text: Yeah, I used to ignore bad days as well, because it was always too scary to count the calories. But I started logging religiously over a year ago. Now that I'm having problems with binging, it's a lot harder to keep doing it. I recently took a two-month break, which allowed me to gain ten pounds. Now, I don't want to normalize bingeing by getting accustomed to terrifying numbers, but I also don't want to stay in denial.

Author: coconutfi
Text: I do this when I’m feeling practical.  Other times I just pretend it didn’t happen and am shocked when the scale doesn’t take my approach.
